definition: to glitter, i.e. be golden in color

translations.bg: да блести, т.е. да е златист на цвят
translations.cs: třpytit se, tj. mít zlatou barvu
translations.da: at glitre, dvs. være gylden i farven
translations.de: glitzern, d.h. eine goldene Farbe haben
translations.el: να λάμπει, δηλαδή να έχει χρυσό χρώμα
translations.es: brillar, es decir, ser de color dorado
translations.fr: de scintiller, c'est-à-dire d'être de couleur dorée
translations.it: scintillare, cioè essere di colore dorato
translations.ja: 煌めく、すなわち黄金色に輝く
translations.lt: blizgėti, t. y. būti aukso spalvos
translations.nb: å glitre, dvs. være gyllen i fargen
translations.pt: brilhar, ou seja, ter uma cor dourada
translations.ro: să strălucească, adică să fie de culoare aurie
translations.sk: trblietať sa, t. j. mať zlatú farbu
translations.sl: bleščati se, tj. biti zlate barve
translations.sv: att glittra, d.v.s. vara gyllene i färgen
